title: Sample NOTAM
subtitle: 28 March 2022
content: We're inviting @everyone, and especially those planning to fly Cross the Pond, to join an upcoming Pilot Briefing Livestream as we get ready for Westbound 2022! The 45-minute presentation is ran by experiences members of the community and will cover European departure procedures, oceanic best practices, and tips for your arrival. There will be plenty of time to ask and answer questions; a recording will be available for those unable to attend live.
